item.description: Hi everyone! After a few months of tastings the May meetup is going to a potluck! Everyone bring a dish of your choice! When you have decided what you want to bring list it on the message board so we don't get 15 of the same salad! Salad is great just not all the same! I think I will be making pizza....you know me probably a couple of different kinds.....If people are really stuck give me a shout and I will help with ideas. You don't have to do anything elaborate or crazy....just please make it organic. KO's is a safe place to eat...no added chemicals! I hope to see all old and new members!

group.name: Manchester Raw Vegan Food Meetup Group

item.name: Manchester Raw Vegan Food May Meetup
